items.title: Lumion 9.5 - Fast Track Photorealistic Rendering
items.headline: Create photorealistic stunning renders in a fast track course.
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to use Lumion 9.5 in order to render 3D models, being able to develop a realistic architectural/design model, which includes the features of render materials, illumination, interior and exterior furnishing, and landscape techniques. You will be able to produce very realistic and stunning renders in a fast-track course method.

This course grants different techniques, abilities, methods and courses of action in Lumion 9.5, in which students with wide ranges of backgrounds will take advantage of the proficiency and skillfulness that is given throughout this course.
